title: Beyond sorrow beyond pain
brief_description: An emotionally moving re-enactment of the rehabilitation of a car accident victim who is blind and severely brain damaged. His girl friend is determined he should be rehabilitated with dignity and devotes years of her life to this end. Finally she is exhausted and must reconsider her position.
